name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Constraint

Banana Beginning Delay Constraint
message: Banana must not fall in the first second.

name: Banana Respawn Delay Constraint
message: Banana must not fall for a second after it spawned.

name: Banana Ground Message Constraint
message: Banana must display a message when it hits the ground.

name: Timer Game Over Message Constraint
message: Bowl must display a message after 30 seconds.
